title: Stream: Apes & Horses – Bleu Nuit
body:
Following on from the release of the EP’s lead track, Parisian dream-pop outfit **Apes & Horses** have made the rest of their debut EP available to stream.

Bolder and more anthemic than previous outings would suggest, _Minuit_ is deliriously uplifting, whereas EP closer _Blue_ is a swirling, atmospheric number, littered with glowing guitar lines, verging towards post-rock. Check out the full EP below, and pick up the EP [here](http://bit.ly/18FUf0M).
